root: ^Hello from Hattusa! I hope you’re keeping well. Scary murmurs from the west, eh? No, enough of that, let’s do business. How does a shipment of horses for your chariots sound? Just let me take a bit of gold off your hands and I’ll take care of the details.

Port20: ^Lovely stuff, lovely stuff! I’ll be sure to grease the wheels on the tin shipments, too. Always a pleasure.
